title: Master Http Request
description: Elevate your network communications with "Master Http Request" - a comprehensive plugin that simplifies HTTP requests, enables JSON decoding, and supports asynchronous tasks, all through easy-to-use blueprints. Compatible with Unreal Engine 5.2.
longDescription:
Introducing "Master Http Request" - your one-stop solution for HTTP and REST API requests in Unreal Engine. This plugin is designed to empower developers with the ability to handle complex network tasks with minimal hassle and without writing a single line of code.


Key Features:

  1. JSON Decoding: The plugin effortlessly decodes JSON payloads, simplifying data management and network communication.
  2. Asynchronous Requests: Forget about blocking your UI or gameplay; Master Http Request handles all your requests asynchronously, ensuring a smooth user experience.
  3. Request Simplification: HTTP requests are made incredibly simple with this plugin. Create any kind of HTTP request using straightforward blueprints.
  4. Easy Headers Setup: With easy-to-use headers setup, the plugin ensures your network communication is clear and efficient.

Compatibility:

Master Http Request is fully compatible with Unreal Engine 5.2. Using the plugin, developers can make the most of the engine's capabilities to craft better, more responsive games and applications.

Limitations:

  1. While Master Http Request is powerful and versatile, it's important to note that the plugin cannot handle nested payloads objects. But rest assured we're continuously working to improve and enhance our offerings.
  2. also large payloads of data can cause crashes when using nodes like print string.
  3. Get request required a empty array to be sent for the body payload.


Why Choose Master Http Request?

Is free

Our plugin enables developers to perform complex tasks in a straightforward way. No need to write a single line of code - fully working with blueprints, this plugin makes HTTP requests as simple as possible. Save your time and efforts and focus on what matters most - creating immersive games and applications.


Experience the power and simplicity of Master Http Request today. Revolutionize your HTTP and REST API requests with us!


Contribute to the project here

technicalDetails:
Features:

  1. HTTP and REST API Requests Handling: Easily make any type of HTTP requests using the plugin's straightforward blueprint setup.
  2. JSON Decoding: Decode JSON payloads with ease to streamline data management and network communication.
  3. Asynchronous Requests Handling: Run your requests asynchronously to ensure a smooth user experience without blocking UI or gameplay.
  4. Easy Headers Setup: Set up headers for network communication effortlessly.

Code Modules:

  1. Module 1 - Runtime
  2. Module 2 - Editor

Number of Blueprints: 5

Number of C++ Classes: 5

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

  1. windows

Documentation: Docs
